"About Strengthening Skill Rings":
"There is a limit to how much a
Skill Ring can be strengthened.

When you earn EXP while wearing
a ring, the ring itself gains Ring EXP."

"When you earn enough Ring EXP,
the strengthening limit will increase.

You can have a ring strengthened
at the Item Lab in the Shop Area,
using gathering materials and meseta.

â€»You do not have to strengthen the
ring for it to earn further Ring EXP."

"When strengthening an L ring,
you can also select a Ring
parameter to raise.

The parameters you can select
to raise vary by the type of ring."
